name: Otto von Bismarck
what_did:
Bismarck helped bring together many small German states into one country.
He was very clever in using speeches and wars to reach his goals.
He also made health care and schools better in Germany.
why_matters:
He created the country of Germany as we know it today.
Bismarck showed how leaders can unite people and plan for the future.

questions.q: What country did Bismarck help create?
How did Bismarck bring people together?

fun_fact: People called him the 'Iron Chancellor' because of how strong he ruled!
